name: Aaron Milam
bio: I have had an interest in functional programming for years, and Elixir has been my outlet for a while now. I love being able to program without hidden side effects, and I love the way functional programming changes the way you think about program flow.

name: Angelika Tyborska
bio: I'm a web developer. I work with Elixir, Ruby, and JavaScript. Elixir is my favorite because of its elegant syntax, great performance, pattern matching, and immutability. Let me help you make it your favorite too!

name: Alessandro Mencarini
bio: I've been working in web and API development for a while, mainly writing Ruby and Elixir. I like, among others: simple code, good music, tasty food.
